Package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.mojo

The abstract base classes and concrete implementations for the Mojos that implement the goals of the plugin are defined in this package.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Source
    Interface for LDAP directory entry sources.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractLDAPMojo
    This is the abstract base class for all Mojos in this the ldap-maven-plugin plugin.
    AbstractSource
    The abstract base class for DSML or LDIF source files located on the class path or file system.
    Dsml
    Represents DSML files located on the class path or file system.
    DumpMojo
    This is the abstract base class for all Mojos in the ldap-maven-plugin plugin that dump content from the directory server.
    IncludeServerDependenciesComponentConfigurator  
    Ldif
    Represents LDIF files located on the class path or file system.
    LoadMojo
    Implement the goal that loads a LDIF or DSML file into the LDAP directory server.
    RunLDAPMojo
    This Mojo implements the run goal which launches an embedded LDAP directory server.
    StopLDAPMojo
    Implement stop goal for the plugin which shuts down the running LDAP directory server.

Package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.mojo Description

The abstract base classes and concrete implementations for the Mojos that implement the goals of the plugin are defined in this package.
